title: Auto-assume yes for continuation prompts, only ask for decision input
description:
Modify Claude's behavior so that when generating prompts that only ask the user to continue (e.g., "Should I proceed?", "Ready to continue?"), automatically assume yes and proceed without asking. Only prompt the user when actual decision input is needed (e.g., choosing between approaches, clarifying requirements, confirming risky actions).

This will reduce friction and unnecessary back-and-forth for simple continuation confirmations while preserving user control over meaningful decisions.
